channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Modernizing Visual Studio Extension Compatibility: Effortless Migration for Extension Developers and Users】现代化 Visual Studio 扩展兼容性：扩展开发人员和用户轻松迁移
item.description: 【We have great news for extension users and developers: Visual Studio 2026 is introducing an extension compatibility model designed specifically to make your life easier. Our top priority is to ensure that your extensions continue to work seamlessly across Visual Studio releases - with no extra effort required from you. For users: exten】我们为扩展用户和开发人员带来了好消息：Visual Studio 2026 正在引入专门为让您的生活更轻松而设计的扩展兼容性模型。我们的首要任务是确保您的扩展继续在 Visual Studio 版本之间无缝工作 - 无需您付出额外的努力。对于用户：扩展

item.title: 【Microspeak: The hockey stick on wheels】Microspeak：带轮子的曲棍球棒
item.description: 【The "hockey stick graph" is a graph which shows slow initial growth, followed by a rapid linear increase. The resulting shape resembles a hockey stick, with the blade of the stick represented by the nearly-flat initial section, and the handle of the stick represented by the rapi】“曲棍球棒图”是显示缓慢的初始增长，随后快速线性增长的图。由此产生的形状类似于曲棍球棒，棒的刀片由几乎平坦的初始部分代表，棒的手柄由拉皮代表

item.title: 【“Cost Management” Is Now “Account Throughput” and It’s Moving】“成本管理”现在是“账户吞吐量”并且正在发生变化
item.description: 【We’ve made a small but important change in the Azure portal for Azure Cosmos DB to make it easier to manage your account-level throughput. The “Cost Management” section has been renamed to “Account Throughput” and can now be found under the Settings section of your Azure Cosmos DB】我们在 Azure Cosmos DB 的 Azure 门户中进行了一项小但重要的更改，以便更轻松地管理帐户级吞吐量。 “成本管理”部分已重命名为“帐户吞吐量”，现在可以在 Azure Cosmos DB 的“设置”部分下找到

item.title: 【What about the icons in pifmgr.dll?】pifmgr.dll 中的图标怎么样？
item.description: 【Some time ago, I discussed the intended uses of the icons in progman.exe and moricons.dll and we even looked at those icons (】前段时间，我讨论了 progman.exe 和 moricons.dll 中图标的预期用途，我们甚至查看了这些图标（

item.title: 【Announcing latest Azure Cosmos DB Python SDK: Powering the Future of AI with OpenAI】发布最新的 Azure Cosmos DB Python SDK：通过 OpenAI 为 AI 的未来提供动力
item.description: 【We're thrilled to announce the stable release of Azure Cosmos DB Python SDK version 4.14.0! This release brings together months of innovation and collaboration, featuring ground-breaking capabilities that have been battle-tested in production environments. Many of these features were developed in c】我们很高兴地宣布 Azure Cosmos DB Python SDK 版本 4.14.0 稳定发布！此版本汇集了数月的创新和协作，具有经过生产环境考验的突破性功能。其中许多功能都是用 c 语言开发的

item.title: 【A Developer's Guide to Fine-Tuning GPT-4o for Image Classification on Azure AI Foundry】在 Azure AI Foundry 上微调 GPT-4o 以进行图像分类的开发人员指南
item.description: 【Whether you’re a machine learning practitioner, app developer, or just curious about the latest in AI, this guide shows how you can quickly boost image classification accuracy using cutting-edge Vision-Language Models (VLM) on Azure—no deep learning expertise required. In this walkthrough, you’ll see how to fine-tune GPT-4o on】无论您是机器学习从业者、应用程序开发人员，还是只是对人工智能的最新技术感到好奇，本指南都会向您展示如何使用 Azure 上最先进的视觉语言模型 (VLM) 快速提高图像分类的准确性，而无需深度学习专业知识。在本演练中，您将了解如何微调 GPT-4o

item.title: 【Boost your Azure Cosmos DB Efficiency with Azure Advisor Insights】使用 Azure Advisor Insights 提高 Azure Cosmos DB 效率
item.description: 【Azure Cosmos DB is】Azure Cosmos DB 是

item.title: 【Streamlined Setup, Stronger Guardrails for Microsoft Dev Box】简化的设置，为 Microsoft Dev Box 提供更强大的保护
item.description: 【We’re excited to introduce a new capability that simplifies Dev Box setup—enabling platform engineers and project admins to specify images and SKUs directly when configuring Dev Box pools, without needing to create Dev Box definitions at the Dev Cent】我们很高兴推出一项简化 Dev Box 设置的新功能，使平台工程师和项目管理员能够在配置 Dev Box 池时直接指定映像和 SKU，而无需在开发中心创建 Dev Box 定义

item.title: 【Using RAII to remedy a defect where not all code paths performed required exit actions, follow-up】使用 RAII 修复并非所有代码路径都执行所需退出操作的缺陷，后续
item.description: 【Last time, we looked at a way to use the RAII design pattern (Resource Acquisition Is Initialization) to ensure that a function eventually got called on all code paths】上次，我们研究了一种使用 RAII 设计模式（资源获取即初始化）来确保最终在所有代码路径上调用函数的方法

item.title: 【Exciting new capabilities and enhancements for M365 Developer Program - October 2025】M365 开发者计划令人兴奋的新功能和增强功能 - 2025 年 10 月
item.description: 【The Microsoft 365 Developer Program has long been a great resource for developers building solutions on the Microsoft 365 platform. Today, we’re thrilled to share some exciting updates that make onboarding easier, environments more ca】Microsoft 365 开发人员计划长期以来一直是在 Microsoft 365 平台上构建解决方案的开发人员的重要资源。今天，我们很高兴与大家分享一些令人兴奋的更新，这些更新使入门更容易、环境更轻松
